dares: Do your best impression of a baby being born.
Sing the chorus of your favorite song in a high-pitched voice.
Do a handstand for one minute.
Call a random person from your contact list and sing “Happy Birthday” to them.
Eat a spoonful of hot sauce.
Do your best impression of your favorite celebrity.
Wear socks on your hands for the next 10 minutes.
Act like a chicken until it's your turn again.
Put an ice cube down your shirt and leave it there until it melts.
